message.content:
To copy the contents of one cell into another cell in LibreOffice Calc, you can use the following formula:

```
=A1
```

This will copy the contents of cell A1 into the current cell. If you want to remove any single quotes from the copied text, you can use the SUBSTITUTE function:

```
=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")
```

This will replace all instances of a single quote with an empty string in the contents of cell A1 before copying it into the current cell.
